name: Findscapes - Match 3D Tiles
description:
Are you tired of some uncreative and boring elimination games?

Find 3D - Match tiles is an addictive game to find 3D models and eliminate them. In this game, you will find many interesting levels. What's more, it can release pressure, ease mood and kill time.

◆ Playability ◆

◆ Challenging new games and amazing new ways to play!

◆ Finding the target 3D model, clicking and dragging them to achieve the level target!

◆ Each level has a time limit. Try to finish the level before the time runs out!

◆ Interesting props can help you pass the level faster!

◆ Unexpected magic props can add fun to your life!

◆ Each level is wonderful so you can enjoy yourself in your leisure time!

◆ Simple and casual games are suitable for all ages!

◆ Getting rewards after completing the level!

We hope you will like this game and enjoy it. In it,you can also train your mind and kill time!
Find 3D - Match tiles is really a very simple game that everyone can play. Join and challenge it. Let's see how far you can go!
